body:
Comment 9: 
I have enough working for lldb now that I'm confident that this design *could* work. Now
the question is what other folks think of it. Will email golang-dev shortly to get
feedback.

@shanemhansen, sorry for the long delays on this. It'd still be very useful to see your
gdbtest.go and gdbtest.gdb, since the next next step for this would be to convert those
test scripts.
